entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
